section.p: The men of the Soulwatch bow their heads and leave without a word. Puzzled, you sit at a street-bar, to take a cup of wine. After a while the patrol returns, dragging the charlatan healer behind them. He is trussed in chains from head to foot. In absolute silence, they return your .
You enquire as to the likely fate of the charlatan. 'The Red Garden, of course, O Exalted One,' whispers one of the Soulwatch in a voice like the wind in the trees.
